1: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִרְאֶה֩ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שׁ֨וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>ox</n> אָחִ֜יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>thy brother's</n> א֤וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׂיוֹ֙ <sup>7716 </sup> <n>or his sheep</n> נִדָּחִ֔ים <sup>5080 </sup> <n>go astray</n> וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <sup>5956 </sup> <n>and hide</n> מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>you</n> הָשֵׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>thyself from them thou shalt in any case</n> תְּשִׁיבֵ֖ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>bring them again</n> לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>unto thy brother</n>
2: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> קָר֥וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[be] not nigh</n> אָחִ֛יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>And if thy brother</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְדַעְתּ֑וֹ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto thee or if thou know</n> וַאֲסַפְתּוֹ֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>him not then thou shalt bring</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> תּ֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>it unto</n> בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>thine own house</n> וְהָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall remain</n> עִמְּךָ֗ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>you</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> דְּרֹ֤שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>seek</n> אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>and it shall be with thee until thy brother</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַהֲשֵׁבֹת֖וֹ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>after it and thou shalt restore it to him again</n> לֽוֹ׃
3: וְכֵ֧ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>In like manner</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shalt thou do</n> לַחֲמֹר֗וֹ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>with his ass</n> וְכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>the same</n> תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and so shalt thou do</n> לְשִׂמְלָתוֹ֒ <sup>8071 </sup> <n>with his raiment</n> וְכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>likewise</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֜ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shalt thou do</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>anything</n> אֲבֵדַ֥ת <sup>9 </sup> <n>and with all lost thing</n> אָחִ֛יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>of thy brother's</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תֹּאבַ֥ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>which he hath lost</n> מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>and you</n> וּמְצָאתָ֑הּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and thou hast found</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> תוּכַ֖ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>likewise thou mayest</n> לְהִתְעַלֵּֽם׃ <sup>5956 </sup> <n>not hide</n> ס
4: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִרְאֶה֩ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲמ֨וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>ass</n> אָחִ֜יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>thy brother's</n> א֤וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> שׁוֹרוֹ֙ <sup>7794 </sup> <n>or his ox</n> נֹפְלִ֣ים <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fall down</n> בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <sup>5956 </sup> <n>and hide</n> מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>you</n> הָקֵ֥ם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>thyself from them thou shalt surely</n> תָּקִ֖ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>help him to lift [them] up again</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> ס
5: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>wear</n> כְלִי־ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>shall not wear that which pertaineth</n> גֶ֙בֶר֙ <sup>1397 </sup> <n>unto a man</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>The woman</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִלְבַּ֥שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>put</n> גֶּ֖בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>neither shall a man</n> שִׂמְלַ֣ת <sup>8071 </sup> <n>garment</n> אִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>on a woman's</n> כִּ֧י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>[are] abomination</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whoever</n> עֹ֥שֵׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>for all that do</n> אֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>so</n> פ
6: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִקָּרֵ֣א <sup>7122 </sup> <n>chance</n> קַן־ <sup>7064 </sup> <n>nest</n> צִפּ֣וֹר ׀ <sup>6833 </sup> <n>If a bird's</n> לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>to be before</n> בַּדֶּ֜רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thee in the way</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> עֵ֣ץ ׀ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>in any tree</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>or on the ground</n> אֶפְרֹחִים֙ <sup>667 </sup> <n>[whether they be] young ones</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בֵיצִ֔ים <sup>1000 </sup> <n>or eggs</n> וְהָאֵ֤ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>and the dam</n> רֹבֶ֙צֶת֙ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>sitting</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָֽאֶפְרֹחִ֔ים <sup>667 </sup> <n>upon the young</n> א֖וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַבֵּיצִ֑ים <sup>1000 </sup> <n>or upon the eggs</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>thou shalt not take</n> הָאֵ֖ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>the dam</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> הַבָּנִֽים׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>with the young</n>
7: שַׁלֵּ֤חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[But] thou shalt in any wise</n> תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>go</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֵ֔ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>let the dam</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the young</n> תִּֽקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take</n> לָ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> יִ֣יטַב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>to thee that it may be well</n> לָ֔ךְ וְהַאֲרַכְתָּ֖ <sup>748 </sup> <n>with thee and [that] thou mayest prolong</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[thy] days</n> ס
8: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תִבְנֶה֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>When thou buildest</n> בַּ֣יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> חָדָ֔שׁ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>a new</n> וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>then thou shalt make</n> מַעֲקֶ֖ה <sup>4624 </sup> <n>a battlement</n> לְגַגֶּ֑ךָ <sup>1406 </sup> <n>for thy roof</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you will not</n> תָשִׂ֤ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>that thou bring</n> דָּמִים֙ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>not blood</n> בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon thine house</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יִפֹּ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>if any man</n> הַנֹּפֵ֖ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fall</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> ס
9: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִזְרַ֥ע <sup>2232 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not sow</n> כַּרְמְךָ֖ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>thy vineyard</n> כִּלְאָ֑יִם <sup>3610 </sup> <n>with divers seeds</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>or</n> תִּקְדַּ֗שׁ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>be defiled</n> הַֽמְלֵאָ֤ה <sup>4395 </sup> <n>lest the fruit</n> הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>of thy seed</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּזְרָ֔ע <sup>2232 </sup> <n>which thou hast sown</n> וּתְבוּאַ֖ת <sup>8393 </sup> <n>and the fruit</n> הַכָּֽרֶם׃ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>of thy vineyard</n> ס

17: וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> ה֡וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> שָׂם֩ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And lo he hath given</n> עֲלִילֹ֨ת <sup>5949 </sup> <n>occasions</n> דְּבָרִ֜ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of speech</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[against her] saying</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> מָצָ֤אתִי <sup>4672 </sup> <n>I found</n> לְבִתְּךָ֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>not thy daughter</n> בְּתוּלִ֔ים <sup>1331 </sup> <n>a maid</n> וְאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>this</n> בְּתוּלֵ֣י <sup>1331 </sup> <n>virginity</n> בִתִּ֑י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and yet these [are the tokens of] my daughter's</n> וּפָֽרְשׂוּ֙ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>And they shall spread</n> הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <sup>8071 </sup> <n>the cloth</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> זִקְנֵ֥י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>the elders</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n>
